name: auto_complete_deprecated
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trading_view.
Tool description: This API helps you to query for data which is obtained by professional providers who have direct and extensive access to stock quotes, futures, popular indices, Forex, Bitcoin and CFDs to create a financial community site/application, such as : tradingview.com
API description: Fetches suggestions for a given term or phrase from the Trading View API.

text.description: Any term or phrase for which to get suggestions.

type.description: One of the following : stock|futures|forex|index|bond|economic|bitcoin|crypto. Separated by comma for multiple options. Ex : bitcoin,crypto,stock,...

lang.description: The language code for the suggestions. Defaults to 'en'.

exchange.description: The exchange code as provided by the Trading View API's exchanges list endpoint.
